name: America'sTestKitchenDailyCookingQ&A
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Cook smarter with test kitchen Q&A from the editors of America's Test Kitchen and Cook’s Illustrated magazine. We'll cover techniques, ingredients, recipes, quick tips and more with a new Q&A posted every weekday.

America's Test Kitchen, by the editors of Cook’s Illustrated, develops the best recipes and most foolproof cooking techniques — we test cookware, kitchen appliances, and supermarket ingredients to help home cooks plan, shop, and cook with absolute confidence. 

This flash briefing includes video on compatible devices. New videos are now posted five days per week every Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
